jobs.title: Developer
jobs.description: Mediacurrent is a full service digital agency that allows me to work with great clients & build awesome websites everyday.

jobs.title: Supervisor, Web Services
jobs.description: At VCS I led the Web Services team. Here I had experience managing a lot of subsites! Our district website with 128 subsites and about 70 school sites. My favorite project here was planning and leading the district website redesign for vscedu.org from SharePoint to Drupal.

jobs.title: Web Content Manager
jobs.description: At Furniture Leisure I was a content manager and strategist for 5 eCommerce websites. Oversaw the relaunch of 2 eCommerce websites to an upgraded system, new design, and revamped content for SEO.
